sentences.english: The Liu's always live a hard and busy life.
sentences.chinese: 劉成一家一直過着宵衣旰食的生活。

sentences.english: May you never stop learning for as long as you live.
sentences.chinese: 願的追求宵衣旰食，願永遠學而不厭。

cautious and diligent all day long (idiom)
to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned

to work from morning to night (idiom)
to neglect sleep and forget about food (idiom)/to skip one's sleep and meals/to be completely wrapped up in one's work
morning and night/always/at all times
lit. to open one's liver and drip gall (idiom); wholehearted loyalty
untiring/indefatigable
